page.title: 09School Dinners.
page.content: There are five other staff in our school.They are two cooks, Mrs. Sharp and Mrs. Duffy;the caretaker,Mrs. Smith; the dinner supervisor, Mrs. Creech;and the secretary, Mrs. Fewlass.The school provides cooked dinners.1 child brings packed lunch. Mrs. Sharp works from 8.30 a.m.to3.00 p.m. Mrs. Duffy works from 12.00 p.m. to l.30p.m. They also cook for meals on wheels on Tuesdays and Thursdays. Meals on wheels provides meals for elderly people.Here are two typical menus for school meals: 1) Sausage and onion patty; chipped potatoes;baked beans;lemon meringue pie; milk-shake. 2) Ravioli; Creamed potatoes; peas; Winter tart; Custard.
